title: Da Fang Vegetarian
description: Diagonally opposite the Xiamen Institute of Technology. Bus: 1, Xia 2, 15, 18, Xia 20, 21, 22, 45, 48, Xia 50, Xia 59, 71, 96, 501, 503, 520, 531, 616, 809, get off at Li Gong Xue Yuan (理工学院) Bus Stop, then walk towards the way of Nan Putuo Temple, you will find the restaurant. Name is Chinese: 大方素食馆. Address in Chinese: 厦门理工学院斜对面. Most menu items are upwards of 30-40rmb per plate.
